channel.title: Posts on Dominique Girard, Psy.D/Ph.D
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Dominique Girard, Psy.D/Ph.D

item.title: Perspective And Theoretical analysis Of Suffering in the context of EAS (PATHOS)
item.description: The PATHOS project focuses on the meanings and interpretations of suffering as experienced by patients, close ones, and healthcare professionals (physicians and nurses) through the euthanasia and physician assisted suicide (EAS) process.
